text: Will you donate to a good cause called Save the Childen?
I have never heard of that what do they do?
They are a non governmental organization that helps ensure children's rights to health and education as well as safety.
interesting where do they do this work?
they help kids from all over the world.
Have you donated to this charity before?
I have and it was one of the best things I could do. There are many kids that have not benefited from a great organization like this
how much did you donate to the charity?
I donated 30 cents when I first started
well that's awesome when did you do that?
a month ago
how easy was the donating process?
It is very simple
do they send you a picture of the child you helped?
I am not sure about that. I do not think that is available.
Do you know where your money was sent to ?
It is sent straight to the people that help the kids
Ok where are those people located?
You can find that out on their website
I usually prefer to donate directly, like the salvation army for example on a street corner
